    org.jamesframework.core.problems
    High-level problem specification.
    org.jamesframework.core.problems.constraints

    • Uses of Constraint in org.jamesframework.core.problems

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Constraint<? super SolutionType,? super DataType>> AbstractProblem.getViolatedConstraints(SolutionType solution)
      Returns a set of all violated constraints (both rejecting and penalizing constraints).
      Methods in org.jamesframework.core.problems with parameters of type Constraint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractProblem.addRejectingConstraint(Constraint<? super SolutionType,? super DataType> constraint)
      Add a rejecting constraint to the problem.
      boolean AbstractProblem.removeRejectingConstraint(Constraint<? super SolutionType,? super DataType> constraint)
      Remove a rejecting constraint.

    • Uses of Constraint in org.jamesframework.core.problems.constraints

      Subinterfaces of Constraint in org.jamesframework.core.problems.constraints 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PenalizingConstraint<SolutionType extends Solution,DataType>
      Interface of a penalizing constraint, which assigns a certain penalty to a solution which does not satisfy the constraint.
